Is there a warning about potential disk space impact when mining on the Verus network?
No, the warning is actually about potential battery impact, not disk space impact. It says "(WARNING! may have battery impact)" when mentioning the command to start mining.

your device carefully.
(WARNING! may have battery impact)
to Start mining just issue the command `./run`
ccminer start Verushashing to luckpool.net
